text: Melum, aniyayam ceytavarkalitam pumiyilullayavum, attutan atu ponratum irukkumanalum niccayamaka kiyama nalin kotiya vetanaikku (atiliruntu vitutalai pera avaiyanaittaiyume) itakak kotuttuvi(ta na)tuvarkal; melum, avarkal ennip parttiratavaiyellam allahvitamiruntu avarkalukku (vetanaiyaka) veliyakum
